sourceText: Teens especially need to be able to communicate with their friends.
text: Adolesan yo sitou bezwen pou yo ka kominike ak zanmi yo.

sourceText: Help your teen connect through social media and other safe distancing ways.
text: Ede pitit ou ki adolesan konekte pa mwayen rezo sosyal oswa lòt mwayen ki san danje a distans.

sourceText: This is something you can do together, too!
text: Sa a se yon bagay nou ka fè ansanm tou!

sourceText: Use positive words when telling your child what to do; like “Please put your clothes away” (instead of “Don’t make a mess”).
text: itilize mo ki pozitif lè w ap di pitit ou sa pou l fè; tankou “Tanpri met rad ou yo nan plas yo” (olye “Poukisa la a tèt anba”).

sourceText: Say the behaviour you want to see.
text: Di fason w ta renmen wè yo konpòte yo.

sourceText: Help your teen stay connected.
text: Ede pitit ou ki adolesan rete konekte.

sourceText: Praise your child when they are behaving well.
text: Felisite pitit ou a lè l byen konpòte l.

sourceText: Keeping It Positive
text: Kenbe l pozitif

sourceText: Covid-19 Parenting
text: Edikasyon timoun nan peryòd Covid-19

sourceText: It‘s hard to feel positive when our kids or teenagers are driving us crazy. We often end up saying “Stop doing that!”
text: Sa difisil pou w rete pozitif lè timoun ou yo oswa adolesan yo soti pou yo fè w fou. Souvan, alafen ou di yo “Pa fè sa!”

sourceText: But children are much more likely to do what we ask if we give them positive instructions and lots of praise for what they do right.
text: Men timoun li pi fasil pou timoun yo fè sa nou mande yo si nou ba yo enstriksyon ki pozitif epi felisite yo souvan pou sa yo fè ki bon.

sourceText: Shouting at your child will just make you and them more stressed and angrier. Get your child’s attention by using their name. Speak in a calm voice.
text: Lè w rele sou yo sa fè ni ou ni yo vin pi an kòlè e pi strese. Chèche jwenn atansyon pitit ou lè rele yo nan non yo lè w ap pale ak yo. Pale ak yon ton vwa ki kalm.

sourceText: It’s all in the delivery.
text: Tout bagay la se fason w di sa wap di a.

sourceText: Try praising your child or teenager for something they have done well.
text: Eseye felisite timoun ou yo oswa pitit ou ki adolesan pou bon bagay yo fè.

sourceText: They may not show it, but you’ll see them doing that good thing again.
text: Yo ka pa montre sa, men ou pral wè yo k ap fè bon bagay sa a ankò.

sourceText: It will also reassure them that you notice and care.
text: Sa ap ba yo asirans ou wè sa yo fè epi w enterese nan sa yo fè.

sourceText: Can your child actually do what you are asking them?
text: Eske timoun ou yo ka vrèman fè sa w mande yo?

sourceText: It is very hard for a child to keep quiet inside for a whole day but maybe they can keep quiet for 15 minutes while you are on a call.
text: Li difisil anpil pou yon timoun rete an silans pandan tout yon jounen, men yo ka rete an silans pandan 15 minit pandan w nan yon apèl.

sourceText: Get real.
text: Se pou w reyalis.

sourceText: Parenting tips from WHO
text: Konsèy ki soti nan WHO pou paran

sourceText: Parenting tips from UNICEF
text: Konsèy ki soti nan UNICEF pou paran

sourceText: In worldwide languages
text: Nan tout kalite lang yo pale nan mond lan

sourceText: evidence-base
text: baze sou bonjan prèv

sourceText: For more information click below links:
text: Pou jwenn plis enfòmasyon klike sou lyen ki pi ba yo:

sourceText: Partners
text: Patnè yo

sourceText: Funders
text: Moun ki finanse yo
